Name: Overview
Broadway: "This library contains data about Broadway shows that ran from January 6th, 2019 to March 21st, 2021"

Name: Description
Broadway: "This library holds data about over Broadway shows, grouped over weeklong periods. The dataset is made available by the Broadway League (the national trade association for the Broadway industry), and you can view the data online at http://www.broadwayleague.com/."

Name: ,Date.Full
column3: The full date representation that this performance's week ended on in "Month/Day/Year" format.

Name: ,Statistics.Previews
column3: The number of preview shows given.

Name: ,Statistics.Gross
column3: The Gross Gross of this performance, or how much it made in total across the entire week. Measured in dollars.

Name: ,Statistics.GrossPrev
column3: The gross from the previous week. If there is no previous week, represented with "$."

Name: ,Statistics.GrossProportion
column3: What proportion of the gross potential was the gross amount.

Name: ,Statistics.Attendance
column3: The total number of people who attended performances over the week.

Name: ,Statistics.AttendancePrev
column3: The attendance from the previous week.

Name: ,Statistics.Capacity
column3: The percentage of the theatre that was filled that week
